tit.e: The National Museum of Modern Art, Kyoto (MOMAK)
The National Museum of Modern Art, Kyoto (MOMAK)
The National Museum of Modern Art, Kyoto (MOMAK)

sen.j: 京都国立近代美術館（きょうとこくりつきんだいびじゅつかん 英表記The National Museum of Modern Art, Kyoto 略称MOMAK）は、京都市左京区岡崎公園内にある、独立行政法人国立美術館が運営する美術館である。
sen.e: Located in Okazaki-koen Park, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, The National Museum of Modern Art, Kyoto (MOMAK), is an art museum operated by the Independent Administrative Institution National Museum of Art.
Located in Okazaki-koen Park, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, The National Museum of Modern Art, Kyoto (MOMAK), is an art museum operated by the Independent Administrative Institution National Museum of Art.
Located in Okazaki-koen Park, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, The National Museum of Modern Art, Kyoto (MOMAK), is an art museum operated by the Independent Administrative Institution National Museum of Art.

sen.j: プリツカー賞建築家槇文彦（当時の槇総合計画事務所主任所員：澤岡清秀）による設計である。
sen.e: Its building was designed by the Pritzker Architecture Prize winner, Fumihiko MAKI (then Kiyohide SAWAOKA, a chief architect of Maki and Associates).
The building was designed by the Pritzker Architecture Prize winner, Fumihiko MAKI (and Kiyohide SAWAOKA, a chief architect of Maki and Associates).
sen.cmt: 「Its」→「The」,「then」→「and」- using 'then' makes it unclear that it was designed by two different people.
sen.e: The building was designed by the Pritzker Architecture Prize winner, Fumihiko MAKI (and Kiyohide SAWAOKA, a chief architect of Maki and Associates).

sen.j: 日本の近代美術史全体に配慮しながら、京都を中心に関西・西日本の美術に比重を置き、京都画壇の日本画、洋画などを積極的に収集、展示し、河井寛次郎の陶芸、染織など工芸作品のコレクションも充実している。
sen.e: Overviewing the whole area of modern art of Japan, MOMAK places particular emphasis on collections and exhibitions of arts in the western region of Japan, such as Japanese-style paintings of the Kyoto School and other Western-style paintings, and also it has a large collection of art works, such as ceramics and dyed textiles of Kanjiro KAWAI.

While containing an overview of the whole of modern art in Japan, MOMAK places particular emphasis on collections and art exhibitions in the western regions of Japan, such as Japanese-style paintings of the Kyoto School and Western-style paintings, and also it has a large collection of art works, such as the ceramics and dyed textiles of Kanjiro KAWAI.
sen.cmt: 再構成しました。「exhibitions of arts」→「art exhibitions」「region」→「regions」「other」削除「the」挿入
sen.e: While containing an overview of the whole of modern art in Japan, MOMAK places particular emphasis on collections and art exhibitions in the western regions of Japan especially in Kyoto, such as Japanese-style paintings of the Kyoto School and Western-style paintings, and also it has a large collection of art works, such as the ceramics of Kanjiro KAWAI and dyed textiles.
sen.cmt: of Kanjiro KAWAIの位置を移動especially in Kyoto補足

sen.j: 1963年 京都市勧業館別館を改装し、「国立近代美術館京都分館」として開館
sen.e: In 1963, the auxiliary building of The Kyoto Municipal Exhibition Hall for Industrial Affairs was refurbished to open "The Annex Museum of The National Museum of Modern Art in Kyoto."
In 1963, the auxiliary building of The Kyoto Municipal Exhibition Hall for Industrial Affairs was refurbished and reopened as "The Annex Museum of The National Museum of Modern Art in Kyoto."
1963: The auxiliary building of The Kyoto Municipal Exhibition Hall for Industrial Affairs was refurbished and reopened as 'The Annex Museum of The National Museum of Modern Art in Kyoto.'
sen.cmt: 原文の「」に合わせ"を'に"In 1963,"→"1963:"に変更しました。

sen.j: 1967年 独立し「京都国立近代美術館」となる
sen.e: In 1967, it became independent as "The National Musuem of Modern Art, Kyoto."
In 1967, it became independent as "The National Musuem of Modern Art, Kyoto."
1967: It became independent as 'The National Museum of Modern Art, Kyoto.'
sen.cmt: 原文の「」に合わせ"を'にスペル"In 1967,"→"1967:"に変更しました。

sen.e: In 1986, the its new building was completed.
In 1986, it was extended, with the completion of a new building.
1986: It was extended, with the completion of a new building.

sen.j: 2004年 独立行政法人国立美術館へ移管
sen.e: In 2004, MOMAK's management was transferred to the Independent Administrative Institution National Museum of Art.
In 2004, MOMAK's management was transferred to the Independent Administrative Institution National Museum of Art.
2004: MOMAK's management was transferred to the Independent Administrative Institution National Museum of Art.
